attributes.action: ensure that a life sentence for murder means exactly that. Anyone who recklessly takes the life of another person should never be allowed out of prison. The latest life sentences on the killers of Garry Newlove actually mean that even without parole they will be back on the streets before they pass their mid 30's.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/safestreetsthree/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
